text.div:
Cryptosporidiosis (Tests for Cryptosporidium species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    41433-4 Cryptosporidium hominis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    41434-2 Cryptosporidium parvum DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    60545-1 Cryptosporidium sp DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    80681-0 Cryptosporidium parvum+hominis oocyst wall protein COWP gene [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    82205-6 Cryptosporidium sp DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with non-probe detection
    88927-9 Cryptosporidium sp DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    88928-7 Cryptosporidium sp DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    92688-1 Cryptosporidium parvum+hominis DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
